hour12.name: hour12
hour12.description: Specify the hour using 12-hour clock (defaults to current hour)

am.name: am
am.description: When True, hour must be between 1 to 12 and will be interpreted as AM (ante meridiem)

pm.name: pm
pm.description: When True, hour must be between 1 to 12 and will be interpreted as PM (post meridiem)

responses.amOrPmOnly: You can't specify both am and pm options at the same time
responses.meridiemRequired: You must provide either the am or pm option when using the hour12 option
responses.noAmOrPmWithMeridiem: You can't specify the am or pm options when the meridiem in provided in the hour option
responses.hourOrHour12Only: You can't specify both hour and hour12 options
responses.hourRange: When a meridiem is not specified, hour must be a number between 0 and 23
responses.hour12Range: When a meridiem is specified, hour must be a number between 1 and 12

unix.name: unix
unix.description: Vis syntaksen for et bestemt UNIX-tidsstempel

responses.invalidDate: Den angitte datoen er ugyldig (for eksempel: den angitte dagen finnes ikke)
responses.noComponentsCurrentTime: Du må angi minst én tidskomponent som skal endres. Hvis du trenger gjeldende klokkeslett, bruker du `/{{atCommand}}` uten å spesifisere noen argumenter
responses.noComponentsUnix: Du må angi minst én tidskomponent som skal endres. Hvis du vil ha syntaksen for et UNIX-tidsstempel, bruker du `/{{unixCommand}}`
responses.timezoneNotFound: Den angitte tidssonen ble ikke funnet
responses.unexpectedError: Det skjedde en uventet feil mens handlingen ble prosessert

format.name: format
format.description: Returnerer bare det angitte formatet i svaret

columns.name: kolonner
columns.description: Angi hvilke kolonner som skal vises i det returnerte svaret

ephemeral.name: flyktig
ephemeral.description: Når true, vil svaret bare være synlig for deg

header.name: overskrift
header.description: Vis starttidspunktet (slik det tolkes av boten) på toppen av svaret

components.replyWithSpecificFormat: Velg et format under for å motta et svar (for kopiering på en berørings enhet)
components.telemetryThankYou: Thank you for contributing telemetry data, which helps the bot's future development. See the {{privacyPolicy}} for details.
components.telemetryInfoCount: This is execution #{{executionNumber}} for the {{command}} command (since we started counting).
components.recordingTelemetry: Telemetry is being collected for this command, results are pending…
components.telemetryPlaceholder: The rest of this text is only here to prevent the message size from changing too much when the results of the telemetry recording are available.
components.at12Hint: There are now several different options to specify the number of hours both within the {{slashAt}} command (via the existing {{hourOptionName}} option which now has autocompletion, or the new {{hour12OptionName}}, {{amOptionName}} and {{pmOptionName}} options) and the new {{slashAt12}} command. Use whichever you are more comfortable with. How popular each method is (based on the telemetry data) will determine which of these options will become permanent.

responses.serverInvite: URL for invitasjon til support server:
responses.totalUserCount: Totalt antall brukere på tilkoblede servere:

snowflake.name: snow-flake
snowflake.description: Vis syntaksen for tidsstempel til et Snowflake (de fleste IDene i Discord)

responses.targetMessage: Tidsstempel for siste redigering for følgende melding: {{url}}
responses.notEdited: Denne meldingen har ikke blitt redigert ennå

iso.name: iso
iso.description: Vis syntaksen for et bestemt ISO 8601-tidsstempel

responses.invalidIsoFormat: Den oppgitte verdien samsvarer ikke med ISO 8601-standarden

responses.targetMessage: Alle tidsstempler som finnes i følgende melding: {{url}}
responses.noTimestamps: Denne meldingen inneholder ingen tidsstempler i Discords format

settings.name: innstillinger
settings.description: Opprett en lenke for å administrere innstillingene dine via nettstedet

responses.linkCreated:
Gå til lenken nedenfor for å bli logget inn på bottens nettsted automatisk for å endre innstillingene dine.
<{{magicLink}}>
Denne lenken utløper {{expiresAt}}, men du kan alltid kjøre denne kommandoen for å generere en ny lenke, eller gå til <{{loginUrl}}> for å logge inn manuelt, og deretter gå til <{{settingsUrl}}> for å endre innstillingene dine.
responses.failedToCreateLink: Kunne ikke generere en lenke for å logge deg inn automatisk, vennligst gå til <{{loginUrl}}> og logg inn manuelt, og gå deretter til <{{settingsUrl}}> for å endre innstillingene dine.

at12.name: at12
at12.description: Specify the exact components of the timestamp (using a 12-hour clock)

responses.amOrPmOnly: You can't specify both am and pm options at the same time
responses.meridiemRequired: You must provide either the am or pm option

year.name: year
year.description: Specify the year (defaults to current year)

month.name: month
month.description: Specify the month (defaults to current month)

day.name: day
day.description: Specify the day (defaults to current day)

hour.name: hour
hour.description: Specify the hour (defaults to current hour)

minute.name: minute
minute.description: Specify the minute (defaults to current minute)

am.name: am
am.description: When True, hour will be interpreted as am (ante meridiem, before noon)

pm.name: pm
pm.description: When True, hour will be interpreted as pm (post meridiem, after noon)
